comments.body: I'm wondering if it would make sense to register the `addKnownTypes` and `addDefaultingFuncs` funcs to the schemebuilder by default so that every scheme & package becomes "independent" and can be added to an arbitrary scheme without any new things. The recommendeddefaults pattern would still apply but it'd also be called by a SetDefaults func...
